page.title: 15LANDSCAPE
page.content: {Hedgerows}are disappearing with farmers cutting them down.They do this to make their fields larger.The hedgerows shade the edge of his fields so that his crop not grow there.The removal of the hedgerows also increases the overall price of the farm.If they are removed it is easier for the large machinery to manoeuvre about.It will also stop birds,rodents and animals eating their crops.In place of the hedgerows wooden stakes would be put in the ground and barbed wire would be strung between the posts.The hedgerows are made up of hawthorn bushes and should not be destroyed for the sake of the {wildlife.
